website_summaries.verdict: This bulk set of coozies is a great value and nice to have on hand for parties.
pros: Coozies are blank and easy to personalize
cons: These are not of the highest quality, but they are functional and affordable

customer_reviews.title: Great Coozies!
customer_reviews.text: My dad wanted a coozie to hide his beer from all the old ladies at his retirement home. But when I tried to find one in stores, they all had juvenile sayings printed on them! Not his style. I was happy to find these on Amazon at such a good price. And they arrived AHEAD OF SCHEDULE. Great vendor. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LynnDaly

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I press htv on them to add designs to the blank Koozies. Will order more in the future when needed. Htv applies VERY well to these!! Just used an iron, not a heat press.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for iron-on crafts!
customer_reviews.text: These are prices right! I used iron on with my cricut to make can coolers for all of the groomsmen in our wedding! It worked perfect and did not melt! These are lower quality coolers, though. They are not neoprene!
customer_reviews.author: JAZZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for bachelorette party favors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a bachelorette party. The quality was good and I was able to use my cricut to personalize them. Over the weekend we did lose some of the stitching on one of them, but that could have been human error more than a quality issue. I would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with cricut for Birthday Party celebration. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J DeBold

customer_reviews.title: A little small for fitting cans, but can be ...
customer_reviews.text: A little small for fitting cans, but can be stretched to fit. They rip a little bit when you put them around 20 oz soda bottles.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than vinyl stores
customer_reviews.text: Loved my coozies, the only downfall was the HTV sticker vinyl was harder to press on. Other than that, 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: One came with a hole in it, but the rest were great
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Needed them to make coozies for a bachelor party. Good quality and held up well under my heat press!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: not too good for hot
customer_reviews.text: did not meet my expectation, too thin, not too good for hot drinks
customer_reviews.author: Linda Amadiz

customer_reviews.title: Great to apply vinyl decals to
customer_reviews.text: I used these to apply vinyl decals to, worked out perfect! They were shipped quickly and seem to be great quality. I used heat transfer vinyl and had no issues applying the decals to them. Plan to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great to work with! Seem sturdy! So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was expecting for blanks! I used them for end of year teacher gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these to personalize for a party. Good quality, held up well. Were very easy to use a heat press with. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price. Some uneven stitching, but press nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Plain cozies for beers. Good for keeping beer cold and hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: These were great for monogramming and serves their purpose well!
customer_reviews.author: angella

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for di it yourself projects
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to make my own vinyl design on. Worked perfectly, loved the great price.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Decals
customer_reviews.text: These were great to put decals on! They are a bit thin, but totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke E.

customer_reviews.title: Work perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to iron on designes to them from my cricut. They worked perfectly! Would recommend to other.
customer_reviews.author: Maryka DeBusk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used to put logos on with my Cricut. Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Essence

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality of these! Worked great for my DIY project. Worked great with cricut heat transfer vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! I ironed on vinyl decals for a birthday party. Great quality and shipping. I will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! My fiance and I had them customized ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! My fiance and I had them customized and he used them as a way of asking his buddies to be his groomsmen. They LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
